text: int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } , k ; long int max , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } max = 0 ; for ( i = n - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i - 1 ; j ++ ) { max = a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ? a [ i ] [ j ] : a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += max ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
